svg.content: <mxfile userAgent="Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Atom/1.58.0 Chrome/83.0.4103.122 Electron/9.4.4 Safari/537.36" version="9.1.0" editor="www.draw.io"><diagram></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 78px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal;

display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 177px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 59px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 57px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 245px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 185px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.div:
System Config:
pkgBlacklist: telent ...
channels: focal focal-security ...
components: main restricted ...
architectures: amd64 ...
languages: en ...

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 61px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 82px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 132px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 110px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 117px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 106px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 78px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 242px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.div:
The configuration specifies just the channels, components, architectures, and languages that the domain allows so that unneeded parts are not mirrored and are not available to clients.
In addition, a blacklist of packages allows removing packages from the upstream that should not be available in the domain.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 242px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.div:
The indexes are actively mirrored and modified which is a quick operation.
The ./pool/ folder which contains all the deb files is cached on demand so that clients can start using the repository right away and as the typicall set of packages are cached, less traffic is generated to the upstream server.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 24px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 433px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 242px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.div:
All new content is placed in the 'domain' component.
The new 'domain' component is added to the channels mirrored from the upstream repository alongside "main', universe', etc...
Several new channels that contain only the 'domain' component are added to implement a waterfall release system.
